name: .TIPA File Extension
summary: Learn about .TIPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use TrollStore (iOS) to install the app a TIPA file contains. To do so, follow TrollStore's typical app installation workflow.
To use a TIPA file as a normal .IPA file, rename the file to use the .ipa extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
